form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a priority for the Secretary of Veterans Affairs in processing certain claims for compensation.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Prioritizing Urgent Claims for Veterans Act.

section.header: Priority for processing claims of the Department of Veterans Affairs

subsection.text: Subchapter I of chapter 51 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new section:

section.text: In processing claims for compensation under this chapter, the Secretary shall provide the following claimants with priority over other claimants:

paragraph.text: Veterans who have attained the age of 70.
